name: Adventures of Alice - Chapter 1: Escape from Wellspring
name_original: Adventures of Alice - Chapter 1: Escape from Wellspring
description:
Alice lives with her dad in Wellspring, a quiet and dull town. Alice never knew her mom because she mysteriously ran away a month after her birth. Alice always thinks about her, and one day, she finally decides to leave Wellspring in search for the truth.

This short game was created for the 2021 National TSA Virtual Conference.
